OnlySuccessfulBookings: You can only rate a booking that has been successfully completed.
RateAfterBookingEnds: You can only submit a rating after your booking has ended.
RateOncePerBooking: You can only rate once per booking.

AboutUsDescription: We offer a seamless and convenient way to book sports fields, allowing you to fully enjoy your passion for sports without the hassle of finding the perfect venue. Whether you're looking to host an exhilarating soccer match, an intense basketball game, or a relaxing tennis session, we have the ideal space for you. With a fast and flexible booking system and a wide range of high-quality sports fields, we are committed to providing you with the best experience, ensuring that every moment on the field is truly memorable.
